name: top-trader-ls-ratio
description: Retrieves long/short position ratio for top traders (top 20% by margin balance) from Binance futures. Unlike account ratio, this shows the actual size of positions, not just number of accounts. Output includes: long/short position ratio, percentage of long positions, and percentage of short positions. Large positions from top traders represent significant capital allocation and can be more informative than account counts. A ratio > 1 indicates top traders hold larger long positions than shorts, signaling bullish conviction from smart money.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve (max 500)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since epoch

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since epoch
